price: those who fear their Lord without seeing Him[20], and are apprehensive of the Hour.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَهُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّاعَةِ مُشۡفِقُونَ
footnotes: [20] Or when they are in private and not seen by others.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yakhshawna rabbahum bil-ghaybi wahum mina al-sāʿati mush'fiqūna
